link_desc:
Template for Huawei's wireless Access Controller (AC).

Features/Monitoring:

  • Number of 2.4GHz users on the AC;
  • Number of 5GHz users on the AC;
  • Low Level Auto Discovery of Access Points (APs) associated with the AC.
    • Number of 2.4GHz users per AP;
    • Number of 5GHz users per AP;
    • AP's CPU utilization;
    • AP's Ethernet traffic statistics;
    • AP's group;
    • AP's ID;
    • AP's latitude and longitude;
    • AP's MAC address;
    • AP's memory utilization;
    • AP's model;
    • AP's state;
    • AP's temperature.
  • Trigger for AP's state;
  • Trigger for AP's temperature
  • Calls Template Net Huawei VRP SNMPv2 to provide additional Huawei specific monitoring.

Tested on the Huawei AC6605, but should work with other models.

==CHANGELOG==

-06-02-2019-

First Version (Beta 1.0).

For Zabbix 4.0.

All features mentioned above are implemented.
author: VirtuaWin
